question_text:
Question
 45
A cast iron pipe of diameter 600 mm and length 400 m carries water from a tank and discharges freely 
into air at a point 4.5 m below the water surface in the tank. The friction factor of the pipe is 0.018.
Consider acceleration due to gravity as 
2
9.81m/s
 The velocity of the flow in pipe (in m/s
, round off to two
decimal places
) is ________.
